function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ecological fallacy risk due to population-weighted assessments","Impact":"Misleading inferences about individual infection levels, impacting public health interventions","Mitigation":"Use individual-level data to validate aggregate findings, incorporate other data sources for validation","Technologies":"Data collection technologies for individual-level infection data, statistical models for validation","People":"Public health officials, researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of personal data on individuals infected by SARS-COV-2","Impact":"Limitation in accurately understanding infection patterns and risk factors at the individual level","Mitigation":"Collaborate with countries with more individual-level data, advocate for improved data collection and sharing practices","Technologies":"Data sharing platforms, international collaborations for data exchange","People":"Research institutions, government agencies, data collection organizations","Owner":"Research institutions, international health organizations"},{"Description":"Uncertified research findings","Impact":"Misuse of research for guiding clinical practice, potential dissemination of unvalidated information","Mitigation":"Peer review and certification of research, clear disclaimers about the status of the research findings","Technologies":"Peer review platforms, research certification processes","People":"Medical professionals, policymakers, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, peer review organizations"}]}
